meanings.definition: A type of sleeve that extends in one piece to the neckline of a garment.
meanings.sent1: The raglans on the sweater make it easy to move your arms.
meanings.sent2: She loved the dress with raglans because they felt comfortable.
meanings.sent3: The raglans on the shirt were so long, they looked like wings!
meanings.sent4: Her raglans were like streams flowing seamlessly into the neckline.
meanings.sent5: The raglans on the jacket were like a smooth transition from sleeve to shoulder.

meanings.sent1: He picked out a hoodie with raglans for his morning run.
meanings.sent2: The raglans on the jacket added a sporty touch to the outfit.
meanings.sent3: The raglans on the sweater made it look like a superhero cape!
meanings.sent4: Her favorite shirt had raglans that hugged her shoulders perfectly.
meanings.sent5: The raglans on the coat gave it a modern and stylish look.

meanings.definition: A person who wears raglan sleeves.
meanings.sent1: She became a fan of raglans after trying on a top with them.
meanings.sent2: The raglans enthusiast always had the latest styles in her wardrobe.
meanings.sent3: The raglans lover joked that they should start a fan club.
meanings.sent4: As a raglans wearer, he appreciated the comfort and style they offered.
meanings.sent5: The raglans wearer stood out in the crowd with their unique fashion sense.
